reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects personal information from users through various means, such as registration, placing orders, signing up for newsletters, contacting the app, or participating in surveys. It also mentions the types of data collected, such as name, gender, email address, and payment method.
reply.reference: We collect personal information from you when you submit it to us, including by: (1) registering on the Site or the App; (2) placing an order or purchasing a subscription; (3) signing up for our newsletter or marketing communications; (4) contacting us; or (5) participating in a promotion or survey. This information may include, for example, your name, gender, email address, mailing address, billing address, telephone number, date of birth, insurance information and payment method. URL: https://www.getaware.ai/privacy

Introduction
Aware.ai knows you care about the collection and use of your information, so we created this Privacy Policy to describe how we collect, use, share and protect information you provide to us via our platform (the “Platform”), which includes the Aware.ai application (the “App”) and the Aware.ai website located at [https://www.getaware.ai] (the “Site”), and any other information we collect when you call, email, or otherwise communicate with Aware.ai (“Awa...

information may be transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or other countries in accordance with this Privacy Policy. The data protection and other applicable laws of the United States or other countries may not be as comprehensive as those laws or regulations in your country or may differ from the data protection or consumer protection laws in your country. Your information may be available to government authorities under lawful orders and law applicable in such jurisdictions....

the messages you receive. Even if you opt-out of receiving these messages, we reserve the right to send you certain communications relating to the services we provide, and we may send you service announcements and administrative messages.

view and the features you use, as well as information about whether you open and/or act upon one of our emails or advertisements. We may also collect the URL of the website you visited immediately before coming to the App or the Site. Web beacons help us analyze our visitors' behavior and measure the effectiveness of the Platform and our advertising. We may work with service providers that help us track, collect and analyze this information. We may combine the information we collect through cook...

gender, email address, mailing address, billing address, telephone number, date of birth, insurance information and payment method. We may combine the information we collect from you with information we receive about you from other sources, such as address update services. We use a third party payment processor to store your credit card information. They conduct the entire credit card transaction using industry standard encryption. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects gender, email address, mailing address, billing address, telephone number, date of birth, insurance information, payment method, IP address, browser type, operating system, device-identifying information, specific web pages visited, domain name from which accessed, browsing behavior, date and time of visit, areas/pages visited, duration of visit, frequency of return visits, and clickstream data.

reply.analysis: The answer was derived from the specific list of data types mentioned in the privacy policy document under 'Information You Provide' and 'Information We Collect Automatically' sections.
reply.reference: gender, email address, mailing address, billing address, telephone number, date of birth, insurance information, payment method, IP address, browser type, operating system, device-identifying information, specific web pages visited, domain name from which accessed, browsing behavior, date and time you visit the Platform, areas or pages of the Platform that you visit, amount of time spent viewing the Platform, number of times returning, clickstream data. URL: https://www.getaware.ai/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by accessing, correcting, modifying personal information, or requesting deletion or restriction of access to personal data as detailed under the 'Access, Correction, & Deletion' section of the Privacy Policy.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy clearly states that users can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of data by following the procedures mentioned in the 'Access, Correction, & Deletion' section.
reply.reference: You may access, correct or modify your personal information by signing into your user account. You may also exercise your rights, subject to applicable laws, to request that we delete or restrict access to your personal data, except to the extent necessary for us to retain it for legally permitted purposes. If you need assistance correcting or updating your personal information, or would like to request that we delete your personal information, please contact us as detailed in the “Contact Us” section below. URL: https://www.getaware.ai/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with service providers, agents, marketing partners, business-to-business partners, clients, advertisers, and other third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing data with various third parties such as service providers, agents, and marketing partners. These parties are involved in providing services, marketing, or business partnerships.
reply.reference: We will obtain assurances from our service providers and agents that they will safeguard personal information consistently with this Privacy Policy.
